derivation: from G4862 (συντρέχω) and G5143 (συντρέχω) (including its alternate);
strongs_def: to rush together (hastily assemble) or headlong (figuratively)
outline:
1. to run together
    1. of the gathering of a multitude
  2. to run along with others
  3. metaph.
    1. to rush with, to cast one's self, plunge
